item.title: payam (not verified): Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: payam (not verified)
item.description:
I have big problem with vidalia-bundle-0.2.0.35-0.1.15.
When I was install vidalia-bundle-0.2.0.35-0.1.15 and Configurtion Vidalia and Tor, This program does not work.

I saw a message in message log.
It was "Error from libevent: evsignal_init: socketpair: No error".

My Os is WinXp Ver. 2002 SP3 and I'm living in Iran now.

Please Help me.

item.title: phobos: Comment 2
item.dcterms:creator: phobos
item.description: You have firewalled localhost. disable whatever is blocking access to localhost and everything will work fine.

item.title: payam (not verified): Comment 3
item.dcterms:creator: payam (not verified)
item.description:
So much ty for your solution.

But How could I Disable to Blocking access to localhost??

I have a Kaspersky Internet Security Ver.8.0.0.506 (2009)

item.description: I don't know how to disable Kaspersky as I've never used it. Sorry. Google searching didn't reveal any concrete directions how to do this, but many people seem to have the same problem.
